#summary The change log.

= From Draft to 1.0 =

== do-wsdl-10.wsdl ==

  * The `firstItem` and `lastItem` arguments to `getContentList` were changed from unbounded `integer`s to 32-bit `int`s.

== do-types-10.xsd ==

  * `label/audio@rangeBegin`, `@rangeEnd` and `@size` were changed from unbounded `integer`s to 64-bit `long`s.
  * `contentMetadata/metadata/size` was changed from an unbounded `integer` to a 64-bit `long`.
  * `resource@size` was changed from an unbounded `integer` to a 64-bit `long`.
  * `contentList@totalItems`, `firstItem` and `lastItem` were changed from unbounded `integer`s to 32-bit `int`s.
